name: Canon 550d - Video Kit
description:
I am selling my canon 550d kit, as i have decided to take the step towards a full frame DSLR.

Kit Includes:
x1 Canon 550D (inc. body cap, original packaging, cd's etc...)
x1 18-55mm Stock Lens
x1 35-105mm Canon Lens
x1 RODE Video Mic
x4 Canon 550d Batteries
x2 Class 10 8GB Extreme SD Cards
x1 Canon Battery Charger


Everything is in great condition and like-new:

The total amount of this kit new (rrp) would be: £1306.93
I'm selling it all for just £750, saving you £556.93

Canon 550D w/ 18-55mm Lens: £899.99
Battery: £49.99 x4 = £199.96
RODE Videomic: £89.00
8GB Class 10 SD x2: £17.98
35-105mm Lens: £100ish
